actions.message: Bank Help commands, See list below to use the bank system.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
>freecash - Earn Free money from the bank. 
>bank close - Close your bank account.
>bank balance - Show your bank balance.

**Advertisement: Need quick loans? At Loan Bank, We can help!, Take out any of are loans that we currently offer! Best of all, you don't need to pay us back right away**
See >loans - command for info.
*we hope you don't read this small print, can only take out one loan, Loan's may prevent you from playing certian minigames and or buying stuff.*
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
*Limited Time offers from the bank which include a investment.*

>bank invest1 - Invest into a bussiness and earn back 1,000 between 5,000 money

>bank invest2 - To be set by owner.

>bank invest3 - To be set by owner.

Note you can only invest into one program at a time.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

**Admins only** To get the admin help page.

actions.message:
Welcome Admin! This is the help command for the Admin Portal (Bank System)

Here is what you can do.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
>bank remove @usermention  - Removes a user's bank account (erases to 0)
>bank addmoney - Want to cheat and get rich fast? Quick use this command, You'll get $5,000!
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
>bank close - Close the bank and let users that run the bank command know.
*note: Money earned by minigames and or shops will still work*
>bank open - Opens the bank up from being closed.
>bank setmoneyjoin - Set the default money when users join.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: Closing bank.. Do the command >bank open - to re-open the bank.

actions.message:
Hi! I'm KuyaBot, a bot created to support Steemit Philippines | SteemPH. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact **cloh76** or **cloh76.witness**.  Below is a list of all available commands:

```
------ General Commands ------
!help                    Shows this message
!level                   Displays the user's level
!repbalance              Displays your Rep Stats
!userinfo [@user]        Displays Users Discord Information

----- Economy Commands -----
!bank balance            Displays Your Current Balance
!pay [@user] [amount]    Send DP to another User

!bank adminhelp          Admin help page [Admins only]

----- Games -----
[Fishing]
!fish                    Fishing Help Menu
!fishshop                Fish Shop Help Menu

```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Fishing System! Hopefully you enjoy this fishing system, Please let me know of your feedback! - System Created by GamingFlaming
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
!fish                             Shows this Help Menu.
!fish start                   Start fishing in the channel.
!fish info @user        See fishing status for a user.

**Server Releated Commands**
!fish serverinfo         See server releated fishing status.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: Hello and welcome to The Fish Store ${tempVars("user")}!  Hopefully you are able to find everything you need to help you on you're fishing adventures...
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
These are the basic items you need to fish!

**Note**: All Purchases will be deducted from your total DP Balance 

**Bait** [₱70]                       !fishshop bait              Purchase bait to catch fish!
**Fishing Line** [₱270]      !fishshop fishline        Purchase Fishing line. 
**License** [₱500]              !fishshop license        You need a fishing License to operate. 
                                                                                  One free net included
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Fishing Upgrades and Features!

**Level 1 Net** [₱150] !fishshop net1  Upgrade how much you can store! Up to 3 fish.
**Level 2 Net** [₱550] !fishshop net2  Now you can store up to 6 fish at once!
**Level 3 Net** [₱800] !fishshop net3  Now you can store up to 10 fish at once!

**Sell** - Sell fish to the Fish Store to earn DP! You can sell up to 3 fish per day as per local fish market regulations!

To sell fish use the command **!fishshop sell**  
Note: The Store will buy all fish that you have stored!
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: Fish Shop System 1.0 | By cloh76\cloh76.witness
